mediaDisplay.text:
The Internet Media Service provides a link to media web sites.
1. Press "Menu" on the remote to display the main menu. 2. Use the arrow keys on the remote to highlight Internet in the menu and press "OK" on the remote. The screen displays the names of Internet media services to which your media player has link. 3. Use the arrow keys on the remote to highlight the Internet site you want to visit and press "OK" on the remote. 4. To return to the media player screens, press "Menu" on the remote to display the media player home menu.
